alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:39PM CDT until May 27 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR EASTERN KIT CARSON AND SOUTHWESTERN SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 637 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Kanorado, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE... Burlington mesonet reported a wind gust of 63 mph at 611 PM MDT. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Kanorado around 655 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 0 and 4. Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 433 and 450. Highway 385 between mile markers 176 and 203. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
